meanings.definition: The quality or state of being curved or having curves.
meanings.sent1: The curvinesses of the roller coaster made it thrilling to ride.
meanings.sent2: I love the curvinesses of the winding road through the mountains.
meanings.sent3: The curvinesses of the river made it look like a snake slithering through the valley.
meanings.sent4: Her dance had the graceful curvinesses of a flowing ribbon in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The curvinesses of the sculpture gave it a sense of movement and life.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a shape that is not straight or angular.
meanings.sent1: The curvinesses of the vase added elegance to the room.
meanings.sent2: The curvinesses of the tree branches created a beautiful silhouette against the sky.
meanings.sent3: The curvinesses of the road sign made it look like a playful squiggle.
meanings.sent4: Her hair had natural curvinesses that framed her face beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The curvinesses of the car's design gave it a sleek and modern look.
